title: Caitlyn placing a trap DIRECTLY BENEATH YOU makes 0 sense for both balancing and thematic reasons.
body:
How is she supposed to put a trap under a champion? Does she grab a shovel and remove the earth from beneath them? Or throw them into the air to put a trap under you? This also doesn't make sense for gameplay. Her traps are meant to be a zoning tool. Chaining it with other forms of CC gives her a crazy amount of hard CC that really doesn't fit in with her power budget.

If Caitlyn places a trap directly below a champion, they should have a brief period of immunity starting **after** the initial delay where traps don't work for 1.1 seconds. Additionally, her traps should not be able to stick around for 90 seconds under enemy turrets, she really shouldn't even be able to place them under an enemy turret at all. Make these changes and there goes 90% of the toxicity. She'd be healthy and balanced and still have a good winrate, but now she wouldn't be oppressing the fuck out of enemies, trapping them under their own turret which is meant to be safe, and she wouldn't be using her trap as a ranged root that only targets champions.

A lot of people are missing the point. Caitlyn's traps are meant to be traps, zoning tools, not a ranged root. The arming phase is meant to be fair counterplay, and it is, except when the chain CC happens and her trap just becomes a ranged root. It not making sense was really just a secondary observation. The issue is using it as a projectile root and taking over the enemy turret with 5 traps.

replies.body:
>If Caitlyn places a trap directly below a champion, they should have a brief period of immunity starting after the initial delay where traps don't work for 1.1 seconds

alternatively, just pay attention?

> [{quoted}](name=dynikus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=3TPUfM9I,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-02T06:54:40.933+0000)
>
> alternatively, just pay attention?

No amount of attention helps when you get stunned, then the trap goes below you and you lose 75% of your hp.

chain CC isn't unique to caitlyn, and nerfing traps because they're capable of chain CCing is stupid.
Do you want viktor's W nerfed too because he can place it on champions and chain CC them? How about jinx? Or literally any delayed form of cc?

It's unique to Caitlyn because she's not using them as zoning tool traps, she's using them as a ranged root, completely bypassing the arming time which is meant to be the period of counterplay where you reroute and walk around them or through them if they're still arming.

> she's using them as a ranged root, completely bypassing the arming time which is meant to be the period of counterplay where you reroute and walk around them or through them if they're still arming.

That's not unique to caitlyn at all. How is that any different from throwing viktor's W or jinx's E or Karma's W or every other form of delayed CC on an already stunned target?

Viktor w and jinx e last for a couple seconds. Caitlyn w does this for 90 seconds. Also, Caitlyn's trap gives her a headshot proc for more damage, Jinx trap does a lot less damage and doesn't really let you do more damage then you would by just auto attacking with the possible exception of lethality jinx. Viktor w does let him get off another tick of his ult potentially but aside from that his burst combo (r-e-q-auto I think) can be done in less time than the w takes to stun someone.
But in the case of Chain Cc'ing, which is the case here, the duration doesn't really matter, since you're just putting it right under them?
Because they get 1, not up to 5.

but its not like you can use 5 of them all at once. Jinx e vs cait traps you can chain cc your supports cc into jinx e or cait traps. Its not like you can make them walk into 5 of your caitlynn traps.
No but once Viktor or Jinx use their CC someone else can dick on them. Meanwhile Cait can have 4 other traps somewhere else and still have 1 banked to chain CC with.

> [{quoted}](name=dynikus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=3TPUfM9I,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-02-02T06:57:14.788+0000)

> chain CC isn't unique to caitlyn, and nerfing traps because they're capable of chain CCing is stupid.

The point with Cait is that it increases her range and adds at least an extra 100 damage to the AA without factoring in her AD or if she double crits thanks to passive + crit chance.
I can't tell if you're joking or not. Jinx's E doesn't give her next auto 2500 range and 500 additional damage

> [{quoted}](name=dynikus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=3TPUfM9I,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-02-02T06:57:14.788+0000)

> chain CC isn't unique to caitlyn, and nerfing traps because they're capable of chain CCing is stupid.
> Do you want viktor's W nerfed too because he can place it on champions and chain CC them? How about jinx? Or literally any delayed form of cc?

Those things are delayed, though. The traps aren't delayed, and don't have a significant delay attached to them.

I just think they need a fair, 1.5 second arming time.

Also, I was talking about in laning phase. I don't know if you know this, but Caitlyn's damage is kinda overtuned in the early game.

Other champions have delayed cc yes but they get 1 on a long cooldown.
I was just in a game as darius, 7-0-6, super fed and unkillable.
Then i was lux binded, cait traped, cc'd from top, cait traped, cc'd by support, cait traped and finally after about 7-8 seconds of being cc'd in place i was released with 10% hp left and died shortly after.  I dont mind cc chaining as it is required sometimes but the fact caits trap can extend cc chain up to 5x longer from 1 ability is really dumb.  If my team wasnt with me then lux binding would of been off cd and used again on me and the cc chain would of lasted another few seconds.

If they were able to keep you locked down for that long, that's amazing teamwork.
I'm gonna guess you didn't get qss even though they had that much cc?

so cait is close enough to play a trap under you and you dont punish her for being that close ?

Heh ;D

Brand is an organized entity with consciousness. Any complex system can be damaged by energy, even if it is the same type of energy that it is made of. This perpetual "x fire person shouldn't be burned." meme is actually untrue.

Well... putting a trap where the thing you want to trap is seems like a fine idea. I know I'd trap things that way if I could. And felt so inclined to trap something.


The traps under the turret thing though, that's pretty much her working as intended. She's billed as the siege oriented marksman. Making your turret harder to defend's a pretty natural aspect of sieging it. They're not really for making a sniper's nest or whatever the old fantasy was supposed to be.

She's supposed to attack and defend turrets better than most.

If anything, I've more hated her lane bully identity.
